Mon, 08 Apr 2024 04:20:44 +0000 Onerahi pensioner Ian Score recently bought a block of Woolworths Everyday brand cheese from the supermarket's Okara Park store. When he got it home, he discovered cockroaches in it - the one pictured here and a much smaller one elsewhere in the packaging. Photo / Michael Cunningham
